Category.Name: Features
Category.Description: Control which optional external libraries to use

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseDSound
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to use the DirectSound-based audio player. This requires the DirectX SDK installed.

StringProperty.Name: DirectXSDKPath
StringProperty.Description: Location of DirectX SDK installation for DirectSound support, this is usually auto-detected.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseAvisynth
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to support Avisynth for video and audio providers. This is experimental on x64.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseFfms
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to support FFmpegSource2 for video and audio providers. You may need to configure the location of the library on the Library paths page.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseFreetype2
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to use Freetype 2 for font enumeration in the Font Collector. You will need to configure the location of the Freetype 2 library on the Library paths page.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseFftw
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to use the FFTW fourier transformation library to speed up audio spectrum rendering. You will need to configure the location of the FFTW library on the Library paths page.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseLibass
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to include support for the libass subtitle rendering library. You will need to configure the location of libass on the Library paths page.

EnumProperty.Name: AegisubUseCsri
EnumProperty.Description: Specify whether to include support for CSRI subtitle rendering. The included helper library dynamically loads CSRI renderers, while linking another library allows you to e.g. link VSFilter.dll directly.

EnumValue.Name: HelperLibrary
EnumValue.Description: Use the included helper library to dynamically load CSRI renderers.

StringProperty.Name: CsriLibraryPath
StringProperty.Description: Location of external CSRI library files, for when not using the CSRI helper library.

StringProperty.Name: CsriLibraryName
StringProperty.Description: Name of external CSRI library, for when not using the CSRI helper library

BoolProperty.Name: StartupLog
BoolProperty.Description: Enable verbose startup logging to help figuration out where an error occurs

StringProperty.Name: AegisubBuildCredit
StringProperty.Description: Name the build should be credited to. Appears in the about box, and in the title bar of development builds.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseUpdateChecker
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to enable the update checker. Should be disabled if you will be distributing builds via something that has its own update checking functionality.

StringProperty.Name: UpdateCheckerServer
StringProperty.Description: Server name to connect to for updates.
